class_notes:
ITAL 102 (Di Pietro / Online).  This course focuses on elementary communication skills through a systematic introduction to the basic grammatical patterns and vocabulary of the Italian language. The goal is to widen the fundamental skills of listening comprehension, speaking, reading and writing within a cultural context.


This is an online course. Full participation in synchronous sessions is required (meeting times listed are local to Atlanta), and students should plan to spend at least 15-20 hours/week on the course. Students should begin checking the Canvas course site regularly one week prior to the official start of the term.
